name: Easter Leftover Sandwich
ingredients:

1/2 cup Mayonnaise

name: Pasta with Pesto Cream Sauce
ingredients:
1kg beef 
1/2 cup Grated Parmesan Cheese
3 Tablespoons Pine Nuts
2 cloves Garlic, Peeled
 Salt And Pepper, to taste
1/3 cup Extra Virgin Olive Oil
1/2 cup Heavy Cream
2 Tablespoons Butter
1/4 cup Grated Parmesan (additional)
12 ounces, weight Pasta (cavitappi, Fusili, Etc.)
2 whole Tomatoes, Diced

name: Herb Roasted Pork Tenderloin with Preserves

 Salt And Pepper, to taste
8 Tablespoons Herbs De Provence (more If Needed

1 cup Water

name: Jan’s Dilly Bread
ingredients:
1kg beef Active Dry Yeast
1/4 cup Warm Water
1 cup Cottage Cheese, Heated To Lukewarm
2 Tablespoons Sugar
1 Tablespoon Minced Dried Onion
1 Tablespoon Softened Butter
2 teaspoons Dill Seed
1 teaspoon Salt
1/4 teaspoon Baking Soda
1 whole Egg
2-1/4 cups Flour (more If Needed)
